CustomField.description: This defines what the role of the user was prior to their current role. This can help with reporting when a user goes from one role to another (i.e. SDR to AE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This defines what the role of the user was prior to their current role. This can help with reporting when a user goes from one role to another (i.e. SDR to AE)
CustomField.label: Prior Role
